snippet.title: Must Dash Amigos | Xbox Launch Trailer | New Indie Game 2019
snippet.description:
Dash through mayhem and dodge the danger in this piñata packed battle racer! Silly runs, painful puns, and simple controls at the tip of your thumbs! Classic shared screen shenanigans out now on Xbox One.

- - - - - - - - - - -
MORE INFO
- - - - - - - - - - -
Must Dash Amigos is an Indie Game and the debut title from two-man team miniBeast Game Studios. The pair hail from Cambridge, UK and consist of Ben (who primarily handles the programming) and Ant (who primarily handles the art). It is made with Unity.

The title originated from a Game Jam in 2015 at the company the duo worked for at the time - Jagex (creators of RuneScape) - and has continued to evolve over the past 4 years. 

Designed around a local multiplayer / couch co-op experience, Must Dash Amigos aims to bring friends & family together, waving the flag for classic multiplayer gaming of the past. The title is family friendly and appropriate for children, making it an option for gaming families and gaming nights!

Must Dash Amigos is also available on PC via Steam and Green Man Gaming, and a Nintendo Switch version is planned for Q4 2019.
